post.author: Admin
post.title: We Need Your Help at States!
post.description: Dear Band Families, The schedule for State performances has been posted on Mr. Vitale’s site. Now th
post.content:
Dear Band Families,

The schedule for State performances has been posted on Mr. Vitale’s site. Now that you know when your band member will be performing, consider volunteering in one of our MANY openings.

We have timeslots with NO volunteers.  We need a few hours of your time…. Saturday morning concessions, Gym 2 Crew/Door, and PAC Crew/Door definitely need volunteers.

We still need OVER 40 VOLUNTEERS to run this event…. This is a FUNDRAISER for our band!!! Consider donating a few hours of your time to help… you WILL be able to see your band member perform…. Any time you can volunteer is appreciated!

Follow this link to signup to help at STATES: 
http://www.signupgenius.com/go/805054EAFA729A02-omea1

Thank you in advance for helping us make this event a success both for our band program and for all our visiting bands,

Amanda Kost
President, NRHS Band Boosters
